message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product you're selling. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $150.
I understand you're looking to save a bit on the price, Bob. I can meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $165.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering your last offer, I would like to counter with an offer of $155.
I'm getting a bit closer to your price, Bob. I can do $162, but that's as low as I can go. I need to make a profit, after all.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering your latest proposal, I would like to counter with an offer of $157.
I'm not willing to go much lower, Bob. I can do $160, and that's my final offer. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering your final offer, I would like to counter with an offer of $158.
I've already said I'd go up to $160, Bob. I'm not going to go any higher. If you're not interested, I'll have to move on. I'm starting to think I'll just sell it to John for $150.
I appreciate your honesty, Alice. Considering your last offer and your potential alternative, I would like to counter with an offer of $159.
